name: Pizza Site
description: A full-fledged site for choosing and ordering pizza online. The site includes filtering, pagination, and search (optimized with debounce).

name: Vegetable Store
description: A site for ordering vegetables online and receiving products offline.The site contains: Functionality of photo processing, authorization with the help of zheviti.

name: Sushi Site
description: A site for ordering sushi and other Chinese food.

name: Virus Checker
description: A site for checking files for viruses. When uploading a file to the server, 32 antiviruses are checked at once.The project used: scannerAPI, Bootstrap, SweetAlert.
